on reading compounds: 耽溺【タンデキ】indulgence (e.g. in alcohol, women, etc.), debauchery, dissipation
耽溺生活【タンデキセイカツ】a fast (dissolute) life, a life of follies, a life given to dissolute pleasures
kun reading compounds: 耽る【ふける】to indulge in, to give oneself up to, to be obsessed by, to be engrossed in, to be lost in, to be absorbed in
